channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- FormCraft
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- FormCraft

item.title: CVE-2023-2592|2024-08-02T06:26:09.810Z -- unknown -- formcraft
item.description: The FormCraft WordPress plugin before 3.9.7 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by high privilege users such as admin.

item.title: CVE-2023-3501|2024-08-02T06:55:03.355Z -- unknown -- formcraft
item.description: The FormCraft WordPress plugin before 1.2.7 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
